summary: New characters: Nikodim Fomitch, Ilya Petrovitch. New connections: Nikodim–Rodion (antagonistic).
summary_short: Introduces Nikodim Fomitch, Ilya Petrovitch. Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (4 ties). Key relationship types: antagonistic.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (4), Alyona Ivanovna (2), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (1), Porfiry Petrovich (1)
story_summary: Raskolnikov wakes up in a panic, recalling everything that happened the previous night. He frantically checks his clothes for evidence and discovers bloodstains, which heightens his anxiety. As he tries to hide the incriminating items, he is interrupted by Nastasya and the porter, who deliver a summons from the police, prompting him to prepare to leave his apartment.
